k4.general.invalid-usage: {lightred}使用方式無效。正確使用方式：{0}
k4.general.targetimmunity: {lightred}玩家 {0} 具有豁免權，無法成為目標。
k4.general.no-active-warns: {lightred}該玩家沒有任何有效的警告。
k4.general.invalid-target: {lightred}目標無效。請提供有效的玩家名稱、Steam ID 或目標選擇器。
k4.general.no-permission-due-to-immunity: {lightred}由於豁免等級，你沒有權限移除此懲罰。
k4.general.multiple_targets: {lightred}使用給定條件找到多個目標。請更具體或使用 @ 群組。如果您嘗試針對特殊名稱，請對名稱使用引號，例如 {gold}"t e s t"{lightred}。
k4.chatspy.enabled: {gold}管理員聊天監視 {green}已啟用。你現在可以查看所有訊息。
k4.chatspy.disabled: {gold}管理員聊天監視 {lightred}已停用。你現在無法查看所有訊息。
k4.chat.kick: {lightred}{0} 將 {1} 踢出伺服器。原因：{2}
k4.chat.gag: {lightred}{0} 禁止 {1} 文字聊天 {2}。原因：{3}
k4.chat.gag.permanent: {lightred}{0} 永久禁止 {1} 文字聊天。原因：{2}
k4.chat.ungag: {gold}{0} 解除 {1} 的文字聊天禁止。
k4.chat.ungag.withreason: {gold}{0} 解除 {1} 的文字聊天禁止。原因：{2}

k4.commscheck.no-mute: {green}✓ 未禁言 {default}- 允許語音聊天
k4.commscheck.gag: {lightred}⚠ 文字禁言：{default}由 {lightblue}{0}{default} 發出，剩餘時間：{yellow}{1}
k4.commscheck.no-gag: {green}✓ 未禁言文字 {default}- 允許文字聊天
k4.warncheck.no-warns: {green}✓ 無有效警告 {default}- 記錄清白
k4.banoffline.no-disconnected-players: {lightred}沒有最近斷開連接的玩家可封禁。
k4.punishment.expired.mute: {gold}你的語音禁言已過期。你現在可以使用語音通訊。
k4.punishment.expired.gag: {gold}你的文字禁言已過期。你現在可以使用文字聊天。
k4.punishment.expired.silence: {gold}你的全面禁言已過期。你現在可以使用語音和文字通訊。
k4.addadmin.success: {gold}{0} 已將 {1} 添加到 {2} 管理員組。
k4.removeadmin.success: {lightred}{0} 已移除 {1} 的管理員狀態。
k4.discord.punishment: {"embeds":[{"title":"🚫 已實施懲罰","color":16711680,"fields":[{"name":"玩家","value":"{player}","inline":true},{"name":"類型","value":"{type}","inline":true},{"name":"時長","value":"{duration}","inline":true},{"name":"原因","value":"{reason}","inline":false},{"name":"管理員","value":"{admin}","inline":false}],"timestamp":"{timestamp}"}]}
k4.discord.unpunishment: {"embeds":[{"title":"✅ 已移除懲罰","color":65280,"fields":[{"name":"玩家","value":"{player}","inline":true},{"name":"類型","value":"{type}","inline":true},{"name":"原因","value":"{reason}","inline":false},{"name":"管理員","value":"{admin}","inline":false}],"timestamp":"{timestamp}"}]}
k4.discord.addadmin: {"embeds":[{"title":"👑 已添加管理員","color":16776960,"fields":[{"name":"玩家","value":"{player}","inline":true},{"name":"組別","value":"{group}","inline":true},{"name":"添加者","value":"{admin}","inline":false}],"timestamp":"{timestamp}"}]}
k4.discord.banip: {"embeds":[{"title":"🚫 IP已封禁","color":16711680,"fields":[{"name":"IP地址","value":"{ip}","inline":true},{"name":"時長","value":"{duration}","inline":true},{"name":"原因","value":"{reason}","inline":false},{"name":"管理員","value":"{admin}","inline":false}],"timestamp":"{timestamp}"}]}
